FuncDef: The reset mld statistics command deletes MLD message statistics on BAS interfaces.
CLIs: reset mld statistics { user-id <user-id> | all | all-user }

ParaDef.Info:
Deletes MLD message statistics of a specified user on BAS interfaces.
user-id specifies a user ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

Deletes global MLD message statistics of all users on BAS interfaces.
-

Deletes MLD message statistics of each user on a BAS interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To facilitate new MLD message statistics lookup, you can run the reset mld statistics command to delete existing MLD message statistics if they are not needed. After the deletion is complete, you can run the display mld statistics command to check whether all the statistics have been deleted.
Precautions
The deleted MLD message statistics cannot be restored. Therefore, exercise caution when running the display mld statistics command.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
